cast.name: 克里斯·希尔兹 Chris Shields

director.name: 尼尔·布洛姆坎普 Neill Blomkamp

introduction: Get ready to be thrown into the brutal reality of Off The Grid (OTG). In this new cinematic miniseries from Gunzilla Games, OTG Cinema delivers an unflinching view of the blood soaked corporate war ripping through Teardrop Island. As one of the three warring MegaCorporations ruling the island, Cascadia Global teeters on the brink of chaos. Board member Vincent Roberts cannot allow that to happen, not with the company's shiny image at stake. Backed into a corner, he has no choice but to call in his least favorite mercenary.
